title: Pixel Launcher app search is broken on Android 12 for some
content:
Ahead of going stable next month, Android 12 QPR3 Beta 3 has a curious Pixel Launcher bug that breaks the ability to search for apps installed on your device. 

more…

The post Pixel Launcher app search is broken on Android 12 for some appeared first on 9to5Google.
